The key for the default input image. The associated value is the
object to use as the default input image for the filter preview. Setting the image to
causes Image Kit to use the image supplied by the framework. You can also set the input image and other parameters during the notification

Substitute controls of another size. The associated value is a Boolean value. If the filter cannot provide a view for the requested size and a fallback is allowed, the filter can use controls of a different size.

Controls whose dimensions are the maximum allowable for the filter view. A width or height of

indicates that dimension of the view is not restricted. If the size requested is too small, the filter is expected to return a view as small as possible. It is up to the client to verify that the returned view fits into the context.
